quasar.algorithm package¶

Submodules¶

quasar.algorithm.detector module¶

class quasar.algorithm.detector.Detector[source]¶

Bases: ABC

class quasar.algorithm.detector.MainDetector[source]¶

Bases: Detector

This class represents the main detector for the Quasar algorithm. It is responsible for detecting the type of data based on the provided model.

dir_path = '/Users/khushiyant/Desktop/Development/OpenSource/quasar/quasar/algorithm'¶
quasar.algorithm.detector.detect_smell(data, detector: Detector, model_type: str)[source]¶

Detects smell in the given data using the specified detector and model type.

Parameters:

  • data – The data to be analyzed for smell detection.

  • detector – The detector object used for smell detection.

  • model_type – The type of model used for smell detection.

Returns:

The result of smell detection.

quasar.algorithm.train module¶

quasar.algorithm.train.train(type: str, dataset: str | None = None, output: str = 'model') → None[source]¶

Train a model using the specified dataset and save it to the specified output directory.

Parameters:

  • type (str) – The type of model to train.

  • dataset (str, optional) – The path to the dataset file. Defaults to None.

  • output (str, optional) – The directory to save the trained model. Defaults to “model”.

Raises:

  • click.FileError – If the dataset path is invalid.

  • click.BadParameter – If no dataset is provided.
